con:config.script:
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils(context) def projectPath = groovyUtils.projectPath
context.fileReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(projectPath+ "\\CSVData\\slanje_parent_komentara.csv"))
rowsData = context.fileReader.readLines()
int rowsize = rowsData.size() for(int i=0; i < rowsize; i++){ sleep(500) String[] propData = rowsData[i].split(",") curTC = testRunner.testCase curTC.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("CommentTitle",propData[0]) curTC.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("CommentText",propData[1]) curTC.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("AuthorName",propData[2])
log.info propData[0] log.info propData[1] log.info propData[2]
testRunner.runTestStepByName("SendParentComments") }

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep
con:testStep.con:description:
